assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: MTT Group Holdings Limited engages in the distribution of IT products and provision of SI solutions in Hong Kong, the People's Republic of China, and Macau. The company provides IT hardware, such as desktop/laptop computers, monitors, keyboards and signage displays, printers and scanners, webcams, data storage devices, power supplies, and control and adaptor units. It offers IT infrastructure solutions, such as data communication and systems infrastructure; cyber security, including achiever, backup, gateway, firewall, security and compliance, and protection and response solutions; and digital transformation solutions, such as robotic automation, performance management applications, systems management solutions, and modular data. The company is also involved in the provision of installation, configuration, and integration of IT products into the end-user's IT systems; and IT maintenance and support services. It offers its products under the TriTech and Multisoft trademarks. The company serves SI solutions providers, telecommunication companies, traders and wholesalers, government, public utilities, NGOs, SMEs, and multinational and local business enterprises. MTT Group Holdings Limited was founded in 2006 and is based in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong. MTT Group Holdings Limited operates as a subsidiary of Ip Group Holdings Limited.
